thread.title: Alex Trebek Has Bars For Days As He Raps Drake, Kanye And Desiigner On ‘Jeopardy!’
thread.title_full: Alex Trebek Has Bars For Days As He Raps Drake, Kanye And Desiigner On ‘Jeopardy!’

author: paulsacca
title: Alex Trebek Has Bars For Days As He Raps Drake, Kanye And Desiigner On ‘Jeopardy!’
text:
Via Jeopardy 

Jeopardy! is in the midst of their “collegiate week” and so some of the categories are changed for a younger audience. One of the categories was titled “Let’s Rap, Kids!” and it gave the 76-year-old Alex Trebek a chance to show his lyrical skills. 
The answers were as follows: 
$200: “Started From The Bottom” by Drake
$400: “Famous” by Kanye West
$600: “m.A.A.d. City” by Kendrick Lamar
$800: “6 Foot 7 Foot” by Lil Wayne
$1,000: “Panda” by Desiigner
Alex Trebek + rap category = BEST JEOPARDY! NIGHT EVER
( via @kennyducey ) pic.twitter.com/D0ftzUfDW8 
— SB Nation (@SBNation) February 21, 2017 

I bet Trebek knew this question where this nerd fucked up hilariously. 
There's a rap category in College Jeopardy that states lyrics, one clue included "Weezy F Baby" and this kid just said 'Kanye West'. I quit. pic.twitter.com/KtRJ6uBkDk 
— Kevin Taddei (@kevtaddei) February 21, 2017 

Only a few months ago, Mr. Trebek has also rapped Snoop Dogg’s ‘Drop It Like It’s Hot’ and it was tremendous . 
Now everyone is waiting for Trebek’s mixtape to hear him spit more fire bars. 
[ Uproxx ]
